title: [DESIGN][REGFILE] Implement Sequential Address Iteration Logic
body:
### Description
Implement sequential address iteration logic in the register file / memory block as per specification.

### Requirements
- Address pointer increments sequentially on each valid operation
- Proper wrap-around handling at maximum address
- Support for read and write enable signals
- Reset initializes address pointer to base address

### Reference
- Verification test plan: Sequential address iteration

### Acceptance Criteria
- RTL compiles cleanly
- Directed simulation passes
- Address sequencing strictly follows spec
